name: Bean Game (David T)
description:
A game where you are a bean doing bean things.

Use space to jump and the arrow keys or WASD to rotate.

The game was developed for the Design Buddies Game Jam '21

The Bean Team is:

Gabriel Durand - 3D Modeling | Texturing

Daniel Serna  - 3D Modeling | Texturing

Juan Correia  - Music | SFX

Nicolas Zlachevsky - Code | Game design

David Tobón (DavidT005)  - Code | Game design
